__schema0.description: The tag of the upstream outbound.

__schema1.description: The network interface to bind to.

__schema2.description: The IPv4 address to bind to.

__schema3.description: The IPv6 address to bind to.

__schema6.description: Set network namespace, name or path.

__schema7.description: Connect timeout, in golang's Duration format.

__schema11.description: Set domain resolver to use for resolving domain names.

server.description: Tag of a another server to resolve the domain name in the address.

strategy.description: The domain strategy for resolving the domain name in the address.

disable_cache.description: Disable cache and save cache in this query.

client_subnet.description: Append a `edns0-subnet` OPT extra record with the specified IP prefix to every query by default.

__schema12.description: Default domain strategy for resolving the domain names.

fallback_delay.description: The length of time to wait before spawning a RFC 6555 Fast Fallback connection.

__schema17.description: The length of time to wait before spawning a RFC 6555 Fast Fallback connection.

__schema18.description: Default domain strategy for resolving the domain names.

SocksOutboundOptions.title: SOCKS Outbound
SocksOutboundOptions.description: SOCKS outbound is a socks4/socks4a/socks5 client.

enabled.description: Enable the UDP over TCP protocol.

HTTPOutboundOptions.title: HTTP Outbound
HTTPOutboundOptions.description: HTTP outbound is a HTTP CONNECT proxy client.

disable_sni.description: Do not send server name in ClientHello.

server_name.description: Used to verify the hostname on the returned certificates unless insecure is given.

alpn.description: List of supported application level protocols, in order of preference.

min_version.description: The minimum TLS version that is acceptable.

max_version.description: The maximum TLS version that is acceptable.

cipher_suites.description: A list of enabled TLS 1.0–1.2 cipher suites.

certificate.description: The server certificate line array, in PEM format.

certificate_path.description: The path to the server certificate, in PEM format.

fragment.description: Fragment TLS handshakes to bypass firewalls.

fragment_fallback_delay.description: The fallback value used when TLS segmentation cannot automatically determine the wait time.

record_fragment.description: Fragment TLS handshake into multiple TLS records to bypass firewalls.

config.description: ECH configuration line array, in PEM format.

config_path.description: The path to ECH configuration, in PEM format.

public_key.description: Public key, generated by `sing-box generate reality-keypair`.

short_id.description: A hexadecimal string with zero to eight digits.

plugin.description: Shadowsocks SIP003 plugin, implemented in internal.

min_streams.description: Minimum multiplexed streams in a connection before opening a new connection.

max_streams.description: Maximum multiplexed streams in a connection before opening a new connection.

enabled.description: Enable TCP Brutal congestion control algorithm.

global_padding.description: Protocol parameter. Will waste traffic randomly if enabled.

authenticated_length.description: Protocol parameter. Enable length block encryption.

idle_timeout.description: Specifies the time until idle clients should be closed with a GOAWAY frame.

ping_timeout.description: Specifies the timeout duration after sending a PING frame, within which a response must be received.

max_early_data.description: Allowed payload size is in the request.

early_data_header_name.description: Early data is sent in path instead of header by default.

idle_timeout.description: If the transport doesn't see any activity after a duration of this time, it pings the client to check if the connection is still active.

ping_timeout.description: The timeout that after performing a keepalive check, the client will wait for activity.

permit_without_stream.description: If enabled, the client transport sends keepalive pings even with no active connections.

interface_name.description: Custom interface name for system interface.

local_address.description: List of IP (v4 or v6) address prefixes to be assigned to the interface.

private_key.description: WireGuard requires base64-encoded public and private keys.

recv_window_conn.description: The QUIC stream-level flow control window for receiving data.

recv_window.description: The QUIC connection-level flow control window for receiving data.

idle_session_timeout.description: In the check, close sessions that have been idle for longer than this.

min_idle_session.description: In the check, at least the first `n` idle sessions are kept open.

type.description: QUIC traffic obfuscator type, only available with `salamander`.

brutal_debug.description: Enable debug information logging for Hysteria Brutal CC.

udp_over_stream.description: This is the TUIC port of the UDP over TCP protocol, designed to provide a QUIC stream based UDP relay mode that TUIC does not provide.

zero_rtt_handshake.description: Enable 0-RTT QUIC connection handshake on the client side

heartbeat.description: Interval for sending heartbeat packets for keeping the connection alive

packet_encoding.description: UDP packet encoding, xudp is used by default.

user.description: SSH user, root will be used if empty.

host_key.description: Host key. Accept any if empty.

client_version.description: Client version. Random version will be used if empty.

executable_path.description: The path to the Tor executable.

extra_args.description: List of extra arguments passed to the Tor instance when started.

outbounds.description: List of outbound tags to select.

default.description: The default outbound tag. The first outbound will be used if empty.

interrupt_exist_connections.description: Interrupt existing connections when the selected outbound has changed.

outbounds.description: List of outbound tags to test.

interrupt_exist_connections.description: Interrupt existing connections when the selected outbound has changed.
